website_summaries.verdict: A pretty yet unobtrusive floral sheet set from Laura Ashley. Cool, crisp, and stylish.
pros: Sheets have classic ticking stripe pattern
Four pillowcases included with king set
The sheets are soft and remain so over time
cons: Rare complaints that sheets aren't as soft as expected

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that the bottom sheet is white and the top is print. Picture sure doesn’t show that and if it was in the fine print I admit I didn’t read it because I had ordered this exact print previously and the bottom and top sheets were both print. I can’t e press how disappointed I am because it was to go in a new bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Haren

customer_reviews.title: Cool and crisp
customer_reviews.text: I love the cool crispness of percale. When the sheets arrived I washed them and hung them outside to dry something I have been doing for 50 years. They dried nicely with minimum wrinkles. The fit on my mattress is very good and the bottom sheet does not come untucked. Sleeping on them they were cool to sleep on (I am a warm sleeper so this is important to me.) Compared to sheets I have from the 70's and 80's these were a little thinner but not too thin. Pattern is really pretty and I am glad I purchased 2 sets.
customer_reviews.author: lynn sweetay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many different sheet sets and read countless reviews. These sheets were exactly what I was looking for. Heavy weight, yet soft. Washed well, fit the bed perfectly. I would buy them again. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ceallee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are beautiful and soft but crisp. I LOVE the two different patterns. The muted colors make the sheets look sort of vintage which was PERFECT with my handmade quilt. Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Krause

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. It's very soft and lightweight. The colors are beautiful, match the picture. If you are a true cotton lover, like me, this set is for you. I washed it several times so far and dried on max in a drier, and it's holding up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sheets on the planet. Beautiful, strong and feels like true cotton which no store carries true cotton sheets anymore. Wish they made solid colors too and nairical sheets as well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, but Very Very Stinky Sheet
customer_reviews.text: I like the floral pattern and the colors. The sheets will wrinkle after been washed. The biggest issue I am having with them is that they have a strong stinky odor, especially the fitted sheet. I have washed them with scented detergent and used scented fabric freshener and left them hanging outside for 3 days to air, but they still stink. I febrezed them, but that did not help either. I am going to rewash them, leave them hanging outside for another week to get rid of the repugnant odor. I don’t know what the manufacturer added to the fabric to produce this awful odor.
customer_reviews.author: Hatim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I usually stuck with 100 linen, but these are great for a more affordable set. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: KellyRae

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sheets!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase! I ordered them so we could have new sheets for our bed after our baby was born and so they could be used as part of the bedding for the newborn photo shoot. The colors were perfect and looked great in the photos! They are my favorite sheets by far. I love that they are soft but have a crispness to them that makes them feel fresh every time I get in bed. I have washed multiple times and they have continued to impress me!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about buying sheets online but I’m glad I did. I washed them before putting on my bed, cane out soft and beautiful, fits great on my king bed and stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: Tena

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I thought I'd get super amazing sheets!
customer_reviews.text: The colors were not as bright as in the picture; they are more muted blues and greens. They're decent sheets, but I expected the quality of some Ralph Lauren sheets I have and these just aren't the same. Again, they're not bad. Amazon was the only seller that had them in stock among sellers I buy from. The price was cheaper elsewhere, but not in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Goeman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully smooth and comfortable. They do wrinkle but they are sheets. The bottom sheet is really large and will fit any depth mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets I’ve found in a very long time.
customer_reviews.text: Best sheets ever!! I waited a few weeks to make sure they weren’t going to pill up and they are perfect! I bought a second set. They colors are beautiful. I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the Laura Ashley sheets. However, the quality of the material isn't like the past sheets I have purchased. I doubt I get the use of these sheets as of those in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Helen J Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, the extra pillow set is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissa Van Dam

customer_reviews.title: To thin
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these beautiful sheets. I was not expecting them to be so thin. I have not found them crisp. I did some more research and realized the crisper the sheet the higher count they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: One of my best bedsheets... love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors and the combination... also that my definition of cotton that I have been looking for !!! Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: David Otieno

customer_reviews.title: Small slice of Happiness during quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets so much! They make me so happy just looking at them! So soft too... after just one wash!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Percale, not flannel.
customer_reviews.text: You need to do a better job with your product filters. I was looking for queen flannel sheets. These are percale, not flannel.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Vanavery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are not only beautiful but they feel great on your body! I’m ordering a different pattern. Love these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Redondo

customer_reviews.title: White
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find the bottom sheet was white. It also comes with 4 pillowcases with 2 being white.
customer_reviews.author: karen varnado

customer_reviews.title: No pattern on flatted sheet
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed that the fitted sheet had NO PATTERN!!!! It was PLAIN WHITE!!!
customer_reviews.author: susimuse

customer_reviews.title: Softness not scratchy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Washes nice, true soft cotton fabric not itchy or scratchy at all. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Willhite

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe this deal!
customer_reviews.text: 6 piece set at that price in a Laura Ashley brand- crazy good bargain. Yes I recommend them. Have had several Laura Ashley bedding products as well as dish sets. Always great quality in impeccable design styles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing on package
customer_reviews.text: I love the sheets I own three pair but the lk ast ones I got off amazon the fitted sheet is way to big I can wrap around complete matress , so due to oversized sheet the bottom is use less its hangs over one side about 3 feet cant keep tight tuck because it's way way to big packaging says same size as others BUT it isnt very disappointed pd good money for good sheets and cant use it. The mismatch set is fine I love it but its WAY WAY to big 😬😬😬😬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mising one of four pillow slips upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I would like the solid pillow case replaced. I cannot return as my husband took the sheets and pillow cases out and washed them without seeing that one solid pillow case was missing. Can Laura Ashley send me a replacement pillow case or a credit for the value? I would then change my review, but I feel it is the responsibility of Laura Ashley to have the quality control to prevent this error
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love Laura Ashley bedding and have been buying it for years. I was extremely disappointed in this sheet set. The material is thin, wrinkles easily, and does not stay in place. I feel that these were very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Finally a nice all cotton quality sheet set that fits and lovely prints.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

product_meta.title: Laura Ashley Home Jaynie Ticking Stripe Premium Ultra Soft Lightweight 4 Piece Sheet Set, Wrinkle, Anti-Fade, Stain Resistant & Hypoallergenic, King, WinterGreen
product_meta.description: Size:KingLaura Ashley gives you the option to mix it up, with our stylish 6-piece 100% cotton sheet sets. This set is available in two styles, in which both include a flat and fitted sheet along with an additional bonus of two pillowcase pairs. The flat sheet is printed with a Laura Ashley signature floral pattern, accompanied by a classic stripe or polka dot fitted sheet to round out this vintage-inspired duo. These sheet sets offer a unique well-coordinated styled collection pulled together to create the perfect décor for any room. The Jaynie sheet set is designed with a Laura Ashley signature cottage floral print mixed with a classic blue and white ticking stripe. In a cheerful palette of blues and aqua on a crisp white cotton ground is a sheet set one cannot resist. A cottage floral print on the flat sheet is paired perfectly with a classic blue and white ticking stripe fitted sheet for that customer looking for a fresh new look. Two of the pillowcases are constructed with the dainty cottage floral pattern while the other two pillowcases are made from the same ticking stripe pattern found in the fitted sheet, allowing you to mix and match to suit your style. Queen sheet set includes: 102"L x 90"W flat sheet, 80"L x 60"W fitted sheet, and Four 20"L x 30"W pillowcases. King sheet set includes: 102"L x 108"W flat sheet, 80"L x 78"W fitted sheet, and Four 20"L x 40"W pillowcases. Fully elasticized fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 15" deep.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES:(1) flat sheet, (1) fitted sheet, (2) pillow cases
FEATURES: Fully elasticized fitted sheet prevents slipping from mattress and ensures a perfect fit
DIMENSIONS: Flat Sheet: "102" x 112", Fitted Sheet, 80" x 78", Pillow Cases: 21" x 42"
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine washable for easy care. Machine wash cold, separately. Delicate cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine Wash Warm With Like Colors and Before First Use. Tumble Dry Low. Low Iron When Needed. Do Not Dry Clean.
specifications.Included Components: One flat sheet, one fitted sheet and four pillowcases
